title: The.Raven.Legacy.of.a.Master.Thief.Digital.Deluxe.Edition.MULTi4
description:
proudly announces

The Raven: Legacy of a Master Thief Digital Deluxe Edition
(c) Nordic Games

release date: December 2767
protection: Steam
# of discs: 1
languages: EN/DE/PL/RU

'The Raven - Legacy of a Master Thief' is a
thrilling crime adventure in three c hapters from
the creators of 'The Book of Unwritten Tales'. Full
of twists and turns, it immerses you in both sides
of the story, combining thrill-of-the-chase
whodunit with the risk and reward of a heist story
Paris, 1960. Europe is in the grip of the gentleman
master thief The Raven. His burglaries are
spectacular and he always emerges unscathed. Young
hotshot investigator Nicolas Legrand stuns the
public when he confronts the master thief and
fatally wounds him. London, 1964. An ancient ruby
one of the legendary 'Eyes of the Sphinx' - is
stolen from the British Museum. At the crime scene:
a raven feather. Is somebody trying to follow in
the Raven's footsteps? - Legrand is back on the
case. At the same time in Zurich a phone rings
Constable Anton Jakob Zellner looks up from behind
a mountain of files. He has no idea what lies
hidden in a bank vault, just a few hundred meters
away from him. As he reaches for the receiver his
life takes a crucial turn

This release includes all three chapters of the
game:

* Chapter I: The Eye of the Sphinx
* Chapter II: Ancestry of Lies
* Chapter III: A Murder of Ravens

The Digital Deluxe Edition also includes:

* Soundtrack
* Story book (plenty of background info and artworks)
* "Making of" booklet
* Papercraft mask of The Raven (printable)
* Digital poster (printable)
